2092550.name: Afterglow
2092550.description:
A wholesome slice-of-life visual novel. Experience a laidback, character-driven narrative set in an idyllic suburban neighborhood.

- UNIQUE CGI ART
Rendered 3D art, but with a twist. Highly stylized and original 3D models!

- COLORFUL CAST OF CHARACTERS
Interesting and diverse selection of characters to meet and interact with!

- UNFOLDING NARRATIVE
Additional content to come in the future, free updates with new story chapters!
